## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description            | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ---------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `animated`    | `animated`     |                        | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `autohide`    | `autohide`     |                        | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | (required) Alert class | `string`  | `""`        |
| `opened`      | `opened`       |                        | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `size`        | `size`         |                        | `string`  | `""`        |
| `theme`       | `theme`        |                        | `string`  | `""`        |
| `time`        | `time`         | (optional) Toast time  | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `variant`     | `variant`      |                        | `string`  | `""`        |

### `openToast() => Promise<void>`



#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`




## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                               | Description                       |
| ---------------------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `--toast-background`               | Background color of the toast     |
| `--toast-body-margin-bottom`       | Margin bottom of the toast body   |
| `--toast-body-padding`             | Padding of the toast body         |
| `--toast-border-radius`            | Border radius of the toast        |
| `--toast-box-shadow`               | Box shadow of the toast           |
| `--toast-header-border-bottom`     | Border bottom of the toast header |
| `--toast-header-font-size`         | Font size of the toast header     |
| `--toast-header-margin`            | Margin of the toast header        |
| `--toast-header-padding`           | Padding of the toast header       |
| `--toast-header-small-font-size`   | Font size of the small header     |
| `--toast-header-small-margin-left` | Margin left of the small header   |
| `--toast-header-small-margin-top`  | Margin top of the small header    |
| `--toast-height`                   | Height of the toast               |
| `--toast-width`                    | Width of the toast                |
